Interface Shape

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, ConvexPolygon, Rectangle, Triangle

    public interface Shape

    • Method Detail

      • getArea

        double getArea()
        Gets area of Shape.
        Returns:
        Area of shape is returned as a double.

      • getColor

        java.awt.Color getColor()
        Gets color of Shape.
        Returns:
        color of shape is returned as a Color object.

      • setColor

        void setColor(java.awt.Color color)
        Sets color of Shape.
        Parameters:
        color - The color parameter is a Color object and sets the color of the shape to param color.

      • getFilled

        boolean getFilled()
        Gets filled of Shape.
        Returns:
        boolean filled of shape is returned.

      • setFilled

        void setFilled(boolean filled)
        Sets filled of Shape.
        Parameters:
        filled - The filled parameter is a boolean and sets the filled boolean of the shape to param filled.

      • move

        void move(java.awt.Point point)
        Moves a shape by the specified point.
        Parameters:
        point - The point parameter is a Point object and moves the shape by its x and y values.
